articles.author: Shannon Pettypiece, Lauren Egan
articles.title: Biden calls for more urgency for Covid vaccinations as new variant spreads - NBC News
articles.description: President Joe Biden called on more Americans to get vaccinated with renewed urgency Tuesday as a new, more highly transmissible variant is contributing to a surge in cases in parts of the country with low vaccination rates.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Joe Biden on Tuesday called for a renewed urgency to get more Americans vaccinated against Covid-19 as a variant of the virus is contributing to case surges in parts of the count… [+2540 chars]

articles.author: David Axe
articles.title: This Is What America’s Next Big COVID Wave Will Look Like - Yahoo News
articles.description: The Delta variant has surged in countries with even better vaccination rates than the U.S., and yet many states are already acting like the pandemic is over.
articles.content:
After blazing across much of the world, a more aggressive variant of the novel-coronavirus has finally reached the United States. And its driving upticks in new cases.
